languages.text: "Мы, Гапраки, происходим из сектора Каликсис, из кластера звездных систем, известного как Токарные миры. Мы верно трудились на благо тамошних господ, {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g}, и через служение обрели частицу знания {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}. Затем судьба связала нас узами вассальной присяги с почтенной династией фон Валанциус, и мы оказались в {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Просторе Коронус{/g}. Поколениями мы безупречно исполняли свой долг, пока Кьява Гамма не уничтожила и опозорила наше имя".

traits.locale_text: "Мы, Гапраки, происходим из сектора Каликсис, из кластера звездных систем, известного как Токарные миры. Мы верно трудились на благо тамошних господ, Адептус Механикус, и через служение обрели частицу знания Омниссии. Затем судьба связала нас узами вассальной присяги с почтенной династией фон Валанциус, и мы оказались в Просторе Коронус. Поколениями мы безупречно исполняли свой долг, пока Кьява Гамма не уничтожила и опозорила наше имя".
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: "We Gapraks originate from the Calixis Sector, from the cluster of planets known as the Lathe Worlds. We worked faithfully for the good of our masters there, the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, and through our service, we gained a spark of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s knowledge. Then fate tied us through the bonds of fealty to the venerable von Valancius dynasty, and we found ourselves in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. Generation after generation, we fulfilled our duty faultlessly, until Kiava Gamma destroyed and disgraced our name."
languages.original_text: "Мы, Гапраки, происходим из сектора Каликсис, из кластера звездных систем, известного как Токарные миры. Мы верно трудились на благо тамошних господ, {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Адептус Механикус{/g}, и через служение обрели частицу знания {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Омниссии{/g}. Затем судьба связала нас узами вассальной присяги с почтенной династией фон Валанциус, и мы оказались в {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Просторе Коронус{/g}. Поколениями мы безупречно исполняли свой долг, пока Кьява Гамма не уничтожила и опозорила наше имя".

traits.locale_text: "We Gapraks originate from the Calixis Sector, from the cluster of planets known as the Lathe Worlds. We worked faithfully for the good of our masters there, the Adeptus Mechanicus, and through our service, we gained a spark of the Omnissiah's knowledge. Then fate tied us through the bonds of fealty to the venerable von Valancius dynasty, and we found ourselves in the Koronus Expanse. Generation after generation, we had fulfilled our duty immaculately, until Kiava Gamma ruined and disgraced our name."
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: 「私達ギャプラックの者は、レイズ・ワールドとして知られる惑星群、キャリクシス星域の出身です。マスターである{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}のために誠実に働き、その甲斐あって{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}の知性の光を授かりました。それから私達の運命は忠誠という絆で尊きフォン・ヴァランシウス朝と結ばれ、{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}に参加しました。何世代にもわたって職務を完璧に遂行してきたのです、キアヴァ・ガンマを壊されて家名に傷をつけられるまでは」
languages.original_text: "We Gapraks originate from the Calixis Sector, from the cluster of planets known as the Lathe Worlds. We worked faithfully for the good of our masters there, the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, and through our service, we gained a spark of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s knowledge. Then fate tied us through the bonds of fealty to the venerable von Valancius dynasty, and we found ourselves in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. Generation after generation, we fulfilled our duty faultlessly, until Kiava Gamma destroyed and disgraced our name."

traits.locale_text: 「私達ギャプラックの者は、レイズ・ワールドとして知られる惑星群、キャリクシス星域の出身です。マスターである{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}帝国技術局{/g}のために誠実に働き、その甲斐あって{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}万機神{/g}の知性の光を授かりました。それから私達の運命は忠誠という絆で尊きフォン・ヴァランシウス朝と結ばれ、{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}に参加しました。何世代にもわたって職務を完璧に遂行してきたのです、キアヴァ・ガンマを壊されて家名に傷をつけられるまでは」
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: “我们贾帕克家族来自卡利西斯星区，来自被称为‘车床群界’的行星群。我们忠心耿耿地服侍着我们的主人{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}，并通过我们的服务，得到了{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}知识的火花。后来，命运将我们与辉煌的冯·瓦兰修斯王朝绑在了一起，于是我们来到了{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}。我们一代又一代人，没有一丝差错地履行着我们的职责，直到基亚瓦伽马星的灾难让我们所有人蒙羞。”
languages.original_text: "We Gapraks originate from the Calixis Sector, from the cluster of planets known as the Lathe Worlds. We worked faithfully for the good of our masters there, the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, and through our service, we gained a spark of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s knowledge. Then fate tied us through the bonds of fealty to the venerable von Valancius dynasty, and we found ourselves in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. Generation after generation, we fulfilled our duty faultlessly, until Kiava Gamma destroyed and disgraced our name."

traits.locale_text: “我们贾帕克家族来自卡利西斯星区，来自被称为‘车床群界’的行星群。我们忠心耿耿地服侍着我们的主人{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}机械修会{/g}，并通过我们的服务，得到了{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}欧姆尼塞亚{/g}知识的火花。后来，命运将我们与辉煌的冯·瓦兰修斯王朝绑在了一起，于是我们来到了{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}。我们一代又一代人，没有一丝差错地履行着我们的职责，直到基亚瓦伽马星的灾难让我们所有人蒙羞。”
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: «Los Gaprak provenimos del sector Calixis, el cúmulo planetario conocido como los Mundos Torno. Trabajábamos con tesón por el bien de nuestros maestros, el {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, y, gracias a nuestra diligencia, obtuvimos un atisbo del conocimiento del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. Luego el destino nos llevó a rendir pleitesía a la venerable dinastía von Valancius y, por ello, nos asentamos en la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}. Generación tras generación, no habíamos cejado en nuestro deber... hasta que Kiava Gamma destruyó y deshonró nuestro nombre».
languages.original_text: "We Gapraks originate from the Calixis Sector, from the cluster of planets known as the Lathe Worlds. We worked faithfully for the good of our masters there, the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, and through our service, we gained a spark of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s knowledge. Then fate tied us through the bonds of fealty to the venerable von Valancius dynasty, and we found ourselves in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. Generation after generation, we fulfilled our duty faultlessly, until Kiava Gamma destroyed and disgraced our name."

traits.locale_text: «Los Gaprak provenimos del sector Calixis, el cúmulo planetario conocido como los Mundos Torno. Trabajábamos con tesón por el bien de nuestros maestros, el {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, y, gracias a nuestra diligencia, obtuvimos un atisbo del conocimiento del {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. Luego el destino nos llevó a rendir pleitesía a la venerable dinastía von Valancius y, por ello, nos asentamos en la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}. Generación tras generación, no habíamos cejado en nuestro deber... hasta que Kiava Gamma destruyó y deshonró nuestro nombre».
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: « Les Gaprak sont originaires du secteur Calixis, plus précisément de l'amas de planètes appelé les mondes des Lathès. Là-bas, nous avons servi fidèlement nos maîtres de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} et, ce faisant, avons gagné une infime partie de la connaissance de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g}. Le destin nous a ensuite liés à la dynastie von Valancius, à laquelle nous avons juré allégeance, suite à quoi nous nous sommes retrouvés dans les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}. Nous nous sommes acquittés de nos devoirs sans faillir jusqu'au désastre de Kiava Gamma, qui a apporté le déshonneur sur notre nom. »
languages.original_text: "We Gapraks originate from the Calixis Sector, from the cluster of planets known as the Lathe Worlds. We worked faithfully for the good of our masters there, the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, and through our service, we gained a spark of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s knowledge. Then fate tied us through the bonds of fealty to the venerable von Valancius dynasty, and we found ourselves in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. Generation after generation, we fulfilled our duty faultlessly, until Kiava Gamma destroyed and disgraced our name."

traits.locale_text: « Les Gaprak sont originaires du secteur Calixis, plus précisément de l'amas de planètes appelé les mondes des Lathès. Là-bas, nous avons servi fidèlement nos maîtres de l'{g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} et, ce faisant, avons gagné une infime partie de la connaissance de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnimessie{/g}. Le destin nous a ensuite liés à la dynastie von Valancius, à laquelle nous avons juré allégeance, suite à quoi nous nous sommes retrouvés dans les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}. Nous nous sommes acquittés de nos devoirs sans faillir jusqu'au désastre de Kiava Gamma, qui a apporté le déshonneur sur notre nom. »
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: "Wir Gapraks stammen aus dem Calixis-Sektor, aus einem Lathe-Welten genannten Planetenhaufen. Wir arbeiteten dort fleißig für das Wohl unserer Herren, dem {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} und erlangten durch unsere Dienste einen Funken des Wissens des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. Dann band uns das Schicksal durch Lehen an die ehrwürdige Dynastie von Valancius, und wir gelangten in die {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g}. Generation um Generation haben wir tadellos unsere Pflicht erfüllt, bis Kiava Gamma unseren Namen zerstört und entehrt hat."
languages.original_text: "We Gapraks originate from the Calixis Sector, from the cluster of planets known as the Lathe Worlds. We worked faithfully for the good of our masters there, the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, and through our service, we gained a spark of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s knowledge. Then fate tied us through the bonds of fealty to the venerable von Valancius dynasty, and we found ourselves in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. Generation after generation, we fulfilled our duty faultlessly, until Kiava Gamma destroyed and disgraced our name."

traits.locale_text: "Wir Gapraks stammen aus dem Calixis-Sektor, aus einem Lathe-Welten genannten Planetenhaufen. Wir arbeiteten dort fleißig für das Wohl unserer Herren, dem {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} und erlangten durch unsere Dienste einen Funken des Wissens des {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}. Dann band uns das Schicksal durch Lehen an die ehrwürdige Dynastie von Valancius, und wir gelangten in die {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g}. Generation um Generation haben wir tadellos unsere Pflicht erfüllt, bis Kiava Gamma unseren Namen zerstört und entehrt hat."
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak

languages.text: "Gaprak ailesi olarak aslen Calixis Sektörü'nden, Torna Dünyaları olarak bilinen gezegen kümesindeniz. Oradaki efendilerimiz olan {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} mensupları için sadakatle çalıştık ve hizmetimiz sayesinde {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih'in{/g} irfanından ufak bir parça edindik. Ardından kaderimiz, bizi muhterem von Valancius hanedanlığına bağlılık yemini etmeye buyurdu. Biz de kendimizi {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği'nde{/g} bulduk. Nesillerdir vazifemizi kabahatsizce yerine getirdik, ta ki Kiava Gama yerle bir edilip adımıza leke sürene dek."
languages.original_text: "We Gapraks originate from the Calixis Sector, from the cluster of planets known as the Lathe Worlds. We worked faithfully for the good of our masters there, the {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g}, and through our service, we gained a spark of the {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Omnissiah{/g}'s knowledge. Then fate tied us through the bonds of fealty to the venerable von Valancius dynasty, and we found ourselves in the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. Generation after generation, we fulfilled our duty faultlessly, until Kiava Gamma destroyed and disgraced our name."

traits.locale_text: "Gaprak ailesi olarak aslen Calixis Sektörü'nden, Torna Dünyaları diye bilinen gezegen kümesindeniz. Oradaki ustalarımız olan {g|Encyclopedia:AdeptusMechanicus}Adeptus Mechanicus{/g} için sadaketle çalıştık ve hizmetimiz sayesinde {g|Encyclopedia:Omnissiah}Hermesih{/g}'in irfanından ufak bir parça edindik. Ardından, kaderimiz bizi muhterem von Valancius hanedanlığına bağlılık yemini etmeye buyurdu, biz de kendimizi {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}'nde bulduk. Nesillerdir vazifemizi kabahatsizce yerine getirdik, ta ki Kiava Gama yerle bir edilip adımıza leke sürene dek."
traits.speaker: ToriannaGaprak
